Name: AFTER-HEDONISM
Description: The final event of the Hedonism Festival - the After-Hedonism party.

Name: KORCHFEST
Description: Will host a festival-exhibition of automotive subcultures Korchfest.

Name: METHODS OF UPBRINGING SMALL BURIALS
Description: History, after which you will rethink the importance of family relationships.

Name: NGRID ARTHUR BAND
Description: At the scene of the capital complex "Mystetsky Arsenal" - the world famous gospel diva Ingrid Arthur.

Name: POWER OF UKRAINE
Description: The most powerful and bright representatives of the "heavy" scene of the country - only this evening!

Name: World Cup Soccer
Description: Thirty-two nations play, but billions of people in countries all around the world drop everything they’re doing for a month every four years to see who claims the title of World Cup soccer champion.

Name: Half Marathon 2018
Description: In Kharkov will be the third Kharkov half-marathon. A new route in the center of the city. 2 courses to choose from - a classic half marathon (21,097 km) and 5 km.

Name: The National Basketball Association Finals
Description: The National Basketball Association’s finals are a showdown of stars and teams for the ages. It takes four games to win, but at least 93 games to get there.

Name: Surfing Major Events
Description: The World Surfing Games is an annual international surfing event organised by International Surfing Association (ISA).

Name: International Children's Games
Description: The International Children's Games are a multi-sport competition involving young athletes aged between 12 and 15 held every year.

Name: International Dance Championships
Description: The best dance talent from across the world can be seen competing with all the glamour that everyone expects at this highly prestigious and popular Dance Championship – one of the glittering social events of the year.

Name: World Boxing Championships
Description: The World Boxing Championship, organized by the International Boxing Association (AIBA), is a biennial amateur boxing competition. It was formerly known as the World Amateur Boxing Championship.
